reviews.review_msg: Honestly, it's really hard to understand her and she can be very very unclear. But I got my first A+ from her because I know how her class works. Really, you just have to write as much as you can about whatever the topic is and show that you are really interested and really want to do well. Then the grade just comes.

After suffering through this class, i would not recommend this course to anyone. Rada overall is a very nice person, but concerning her teaching skills, she is lacking (at least in this course.) However I will give this course and her the benefit of the doubt, due to the fact she does not normally teach it.
